game_description: Have fun in this VR sandbox, play with blocks, a bat, and more! Share with your friends for more updates
review_1: suggestion: add some cookies you gat to eat
review_2: Although this game is Really under development this is a Fun game to mess with when your bored but I believe this has Great potential and soon will grow up to become a Great game!
review_3: I understand it’s in development but there is absolutely nothing to do. The bat barely taps any object, it’s just a white void all around, and there’s very little objects.
review_5: I really like this game￼ Just Needs￼ more stuff￼
